text: == Events == * First Orrery built by George Graham == Births == * May 25 - John Stuart, 3rd Earl of Bute, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (d. 1792) * September 23 - King Ferdinand VI of Spain (d. 1759) * October 13 - Allan Ramsay, Scottish painter (d. 1784) * November 24 - Junipero Serra, Spanish Franciscan missionary (d. 1784) == Deaths == * January 8 - Arcangelo Corelli, Italian composer (b. 1653) * February 25 - King Friedrich I of Prussia (b. 1657) * August 9 - Ferdinando de' Medici, Grand Prince of Tuscany
